movie.title: The Fox and the Hound
movie.director: Ted Berman, Richard Rich, Art Stevens
movie.writer: Daniel P. Mannix (based on the book by), Larry Clemmons (story), Ted Berman (story), David Michener (story), Peter Young (story), Burny Mattinson (story), Steve Hulett (story), Earl Kress (story), Vance Gerry (story)
movie.actors: Mickey Rooney, Kurt Russell, Pearl Bailey, Jack Albertson
movie.plot: A young fox named Tod is taken in by an old woman after his mother is killed by a hunter. Full of mischief, Young Tod befriends Copper, a hound dog pup. As they grow up, however, their friendship becomes endangered by what they have become; Copper is a hunting dog, and Tod is his prey.
movie.tomatoConsensus: The Fox and the Hound is a likeable, charming, unassuming effort that manages to transcend its thin, predictable plot.
